messages.subject: I NEED YOUR HELP
messages.body:
<davolade@walla.com>


Dear Ma,
                       Greetings to you in Jesus name.  My name is Davies Olade, i am 17 years old, a refugee from Somalia living in Burkina Faso.  I am from family of  5 in somalia before the war . since  war started in Somalia and i was among of those that United Nations rescue out of Somalia to Burkina Faso .  I  have been in the refugee camp for 4 years now.
 Ma, i want to go back to my country because life is too miserable for me here, there is no better food , no clothe no good house to live.  The sufferness is too much and i decided to go back to my country instead of staying here.
Sir, please i need your help and assistance for me to be able to go back to my country.
I am begging you in the name of God to please look into my situation.  I don' t know may be my families are still alive because ever since i was taken out of the country, i never heard anything concerning them.  The life here is too miserable for me.  I want you to help me for Christ Sake.
This is my purpose of writing you to seek for your help .
May the good God be with you and your family.  Please have mercy on me.  I am suffering too much, here is not my counry even the people of this country are suffering talkless of a refugee.  Pls show me your mercy.
May God Almighty will show you and your family mercies in Jesus name amen.
Please reply to my yahoomail address below.
Yours sincerely,
Davies  Olade.
E-Mail Address: davolade@yahoo.com
THANK YOU

[All the awful things he alludes to are true.
He is almost certainly not caught up in them, of course.
But you knew that.
Hmmm, what are the odds that he actually speaks Somali?
Intel reports that "Davies" is in fact e-mailing from Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso.]

23 April 2007

Dear Davies,

If you click on my website you will see that The Holy Bagel Community exists to help my fellow African indigents.

Let me have your measurements and I will send you some new clothes and of course some suitable reading material including a bible commentary by our founder Reverend Lonslo Tossov BA.

Remain blessed,

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH                                                                                                   The Holy Bagel Community                                                                                            Ligner House                                                                                666 Bowden Avenue                                                                                                    London WC1 FU2

messages.subject: RE: Thank you mr Alfred
messages.body:
Dear Mr Alfred,
                                Thanks for your letter.  May the good God be with you.
You know that  life is  miserable with me here  and that is why am so worried.  No food, no clothes, no shoes, no drugs, no good shelter.  I am a refugee in this place from Somalia and life is highly difficult for me. It is Mrs Tushie now gave me hope. Refugee life is not the best, people of Burkina Faso are suffering talkless of me a refugee. It is not easy, even for me to come and send a message just for 30 minutes only, i will have to sweep the cafe in the morning before the owner of the cyber cafe will just allow me to write a letter for 30 minutes because i don' t have money to buy minutes or hour.
 
Please, i beg you in the name of God to still help me for this situation. Do it as a favour to me and God Almighty in His infinite power will continue to favour you ain all your ways in Jesus name.
 
Don' t relent to help me and i want you to take me like your brother.
 
Refugee life is not the best because one will continue to beg before eating and the citizens of this country are suffering even them they are not planning for their future. It is only God can help us in Africa.
I was even talking about somalia, people still strugle to do something but not like this country of Burkina Faso. This place is a wrong place for any fefugee to come.
 
Mr Alfred pls look for way out for me. May God be with you.
 
Help me greet Mama Tushie if she comes back.
 
Hope to hear from you.
 
Shallom Peace
 
Yours sincerely,
 
Davies Olade

messages.body:
Dear Mama,

                              Good day to you ma.  Hope you are fine in the Lord.  It shall be well with you in Jesus name amen.

I sent  a letter to you through my yahoomail address yesterday ( davolade@yahoo.com) .  I sent  the size of my trousers . Waist 34, Length 43.

For shirts XL and XXL.  For Shoes 44.

Then i said you should help me send Bible.

Thank you ma. I believe you have given my life happiness and joy.  And you are taken away sorrow out of my life, your letter gave me hope. I pray that God will help you ma. Life is miserable for me here. No food , no drugs, no clothe , no better house. It is by the grace that i survive here in Burkina Faso.  I am even looking for way out and Somalia is far from here.  But i believe that God will take control in Jesus name.

I  will be expecting your message ma. God bless you.

Yours sincerely,

Davies Olade.

messages.body:
Mr Alfred,
                     Thanks for your effort.  Please  i  really  want you to still help me seriousely  because life is too difficult for me.  Even the trouser of only one cloth am using has tored, i swear to God Almighty.  Please i need urgent attention. I  want you to understand the life of a refugee, if i did not beg i can not eat.  For me to write this letter to you, i must sweep the cybercafe before the owner of the cybercafe will give me 30 minutes to check my box or write letter and this is how i use to do it everyday.
 
 As i am now i even ashame of myself in the sense that wear faded clothe around.
 
Mr Alfred, if you have anything you can do for me personally before they will come to my aide , please if you can even help me with 50 pounds for me to by some fearly used clothes here before the Reverend will come to my rescue pls help me.  I take God Almighty beg you. For me to eat is very hard.  Infact this country is even worst more than Somalia.
 
Pls look into my case i beg you because i really feel distressed.  I swear to God Almighty that created us, pls help me do something.  I don't know if you can understand my situation.  Anyway God is alive.
 
Greet Mama Tushie for me and help me tell her that my situation is very critical.
Shallom Peace.
 
Davies Olade .

messages.subject: Remember me Ma.
messages.body:
Dear Ma,
                    Greetings  to you in Jesus name. I still want to thank you for your promise.
I wrote you but it was your secretary the sent message back to me. I hope all is well with you.  May the good God remember you for good in Jesus name. 
 
I still want to inform you about my situation here which your assistance is highy needed.
I sent  the measurement of my clothes to you ma.
 
Trousers Waist 34 and Lenght 43.
Shirts XL or XXL
 
Shoes 44. and Bible.
 
 
I hope on your goodness, because i am begging here to eat.
Sometimes church members use to give me little of what they have when i go to church on sundays but this country is even worst than Somalia that i came from.  Even their citizen are suffering that is why if one is a refugee here , life must definately hard.
 
So ma, i believe in you , i hope on you and your promises. I need something to feed.
 
May God Almighty help you. amen
 
Remember me today.
 
Shallom peace.
 
Yours sincerely,
Davies Olade.

messages.subject: RE: Remember me Ma.
messages.body:
Mama,
                   Honestly i am dieing of hungry in this place.  I really need your immediate attention. Help me still try your power. You are the one that gives me hope for now. Even if am in Somalia , may be i will be living more than this despite the problem there.  There is nothing in Burkina Faso here mama.
 Even the citizens of this country are feeling hungry talkless of a refugee in this place.
I have to beg before i could take something. Even to send this message to you is very hard because i have to sweep around the cybercafe before the owner of the cafe could give me just 30 minutes to write a letter or check my box.
 
Mama , i want you to help me do something especially for feeding.
I have stopped my education ever since i left somalia. Life is miserable here.
What would i do now?.  I am still begging you to please look into my case i beg you in the name of God.  Even for me to feed, i need it very, very important.
Please help me try even if i can get something by tomorrow to be feedinf myself before Rev Tossov will respond. I have not seen any of any of Rev Tossov response over my case.
 
Mama , help me try your power i beg you. This country is too hard. If only i can get way to go back to east africa. But everything is in your hands.
 
I beg you.
 
May the peace of our Lord be with you.
Davies.

messages.body:
1 May 2007

 

Dear Lady Bristol,

 

Reverend Tossov has not responded to this poor man's plea for help. Perhaps our holy leader has again been busying himself with the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence.

 

Meanwhile, perhaps you could send this fellow a few golden dorks.


Yours ever,

TUSHIE

messages.body:
2 May 2007

 

Dear Friend,

 

Alas, I have been informed that Reverend Tossov is unwell. For some years now he has suffered from the Bowden Kustardz virus contracted some years ago on a missionary visit to the Bialy tribe who form most of the Holy Bagel Community members in Uganda.

 

However, our patron, Lady Agatha Bristol, will contact you and be assured that this kind-hearted lady will look after all your needs.

 

Remain blessed, 
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH                                                                                           The Holy Bagel Community

messages.body:
Mama,
                  Good day to you ma. I still want you to put more effort to solve my problems. I know that only God can solve man's problems but at thesame time through humanbeings.
Mama, infact you don' t know how life is miserable for me in this place. To alone eat is my problem not to talk of material needs.  To write  a letter to you is difficult , if i did not help the owner of the cybercafe to sweep  around he can not give me 30 minutes to write or check my box.
I want you to personally see the madam face to face and complain to her , i beg you.
Life is difficult in Burkina Faso here as a refugee, mama i am so distressed, i live on street begging to do anything, to eat, to even buy common soap to bath, i don' t have anybody in this place .  Help me take my matter seriouse i beg you.
Please understand me, i beg you in the name of God to please help me, life is difficult for me.  Take me like your own son, i know that you can not allow your son to suffer in life. So please take my case like your own son i beg you.
Mama please do something for me in the name of God.
 
It is because of the condition i am in this place, i am not suppose to beg for anything , i too came from a reliable family from Somalia, going to school doing well.  But i am now a refugee today. I was trying to contact my family because there was no response yet.
 
Mama , i beg you life is too hard for me in this place. Help me meet Mama Agatha to please help me.  Mama , i am still begging you whatever you can avoid for my feedings presently please help me.  I don't like begging before to even eat once in a day.
 
Mama , if you know the way i am , you will not like it as a mother who knows how her son use to be. Please understand my crying i beg you.
May God be with you amen.
 
Yours sincerely,
Davies Olade.

messages.body:
8 05 07

 

Dearest Agatha,

 

Have you been at the Foreign Office's cocktail cabinet again ? I thought SIr Marmite Luny-Binns had changed the lock after you drowned your sorrows in no uncertain way after Chelsea lost out to Liverpool in the European Cup.

 

I have mailed you several times about this little fellow, a Somali refugee living in a refugee camp in Burkino Faso. One must admire his ingenuity in crossing from East to West Africa without any money, friends or family.

 

I have authorised Father Tossov to make a suitable donation but he has been away attending to the needs of the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence.

 

So do sober up and send the dorks, there's a sweetie.

 

And stay off the vodka,

 

Love,

TUSHIE xxx

messages.body:
My dear Tushie,

You must have me confused with someone else. Custard
liqueurs are my poison - and then only when one is off
duty.

At any rate, my email to the gentleman was bounced
back. I suggest he tries to contact this office once
again. 

We are very busy with Prince Charles. Not that one,
the other one.

A

We are very busy with Prince Charles. Not that one, the other one.

A

messages.subject: RE: Mama Agatha
messages.body:
Mama,
                        Thanks for your letter.  But Mama to be sincere i am not feeling fine.  I want you to really help me out of this situation because nothing for me now and i believe you can do something for me presently. The clothe i am wearing is tore already, God that created you and i sees everything.
I am even ashame of myself because of the situation.
You promise of sending clothes to me but you did not say anything again.
Mama i want you to help me with little thing for me to buy one or two clothes here before Mama Agatha will respond to my case.
Please  i beg you in the name of God for this , the only clothe i am wearing now as tore , i swear to Almighty God that created us, i can not lie, life is miserable for me , i need your urgent attention for Christ sake.
 
Take me like your own son that is in difficulties for now, here is not my country and you know if one is a refugee in another man's land how life" use to be.
 
Mama please listen to my cry, help me with whatever you have for me to buy one or two clothes i beg you in the name of God, i don' t have anything here please.
 
Please look at my case i beg you in the name of God , help me today , my clothe is tore i beg you for my rescue just to by one clothe.
 
NAME: DAVIES OLADE
CITY:  OUAGADOUGOU
COUNTRY: BURKINA FASO.
 
Mama , i write this letter in deep sorrow because of my situation and i beg you to please listen to this cry of mine i beg you in the name of God.
Help me still write to Mama Agatha for my problems.
 
Thank you.
May the good God be with you amen.
Shallom peace.
 
Yours sincerely,
Davies Olade.

messages.body:
Mama Agatha,
                             Good day to you ma.  I
still want to remember you about my problem in this
place.  It is by the grace of God that i see food to
eat here.  Even to write you it is a problem, i have
to help the owner of the cybercafe to sweep before
she will give me 30 minutes to check my box and i
can write message.

  Mama, life is too difficult here and i believe
that you can help me. I like to go back to East
Africa back, like kenya but nothing is here , i can
not eat fine , no clothes , no food , no drugs ,
life is totally miserable  for me here. Even the
citizens of this country are suffering talkless of a
refugee in this place.
  Ma, things are highly difficult for me. I have
been calling your attention for long now but no
respond yet.  Somalia does not have embassy here in
Burkina Faso.  Mama what do you want me to do?  i am
crying here everyday to you no message , nothing
even for me to feed here.  I requested for little
thing just for me to be feeding before you will
attend to my case but Mama Tushie told me that you
are in position to help me.

  Mama Tushie promise of sending clothes and trouses
to me  but nothing , i requested for Bible ,
nothing. 
  Mama what do you want me to do, life is difficult
here as a refugee, i need something to be feeding. 

  Please and please ma, i want you to see to my case
urgently.  I am left here with one clothe , God sees
what is happening to me here.

  I keep on having faith in God and you.  I want you
to please attend to my case i beg you in the name of
God. I believe you are in position to help me and
Mama Tushie has told me.
  I am the only person that knows what i am passing
through in this place.  Burkina Faso is not the best
place for a refugee to stay.  

  Ma please look into my case i beg you.
  May God help be with you.
  Shallom Peace.
  Davies Olade.

anything, i am telling you ma that life is too
miserable for me here.  I want you to please listen
to my cry. If life is ok for me here a bit, i will
not be writing this message but life is too
difficult for me here especially living .  The only

matter that i am telling you.
  No clothe , no food , nothing.   I am begging you
to help me out of this situation because i don' t
know what to do.  I need your help very urgent. 

  Please help me out of this mess that i am.  I am
in deep sorrow as i am writing you this message. No
better clothe on me. 

  Mama , please look at this problem to help even
send 100 pounds to me to be able to by  clothe for
my body, i am going out naked. 

  Please don' t keep silent over me, i need your
urgent attention ma.

  I wrote to Mama Tushie over this to help me at
least to put clothe on my body, life of a refugee
here is not the best in this country Burkina Faso.

  Mama i beg you in the name of God this is the only
way to communicate with you and to write this
message is very hard for me and please don' t keep
silent over this i beg you.

  Is just because you don' t know what i am passing
through here, if am your biological son, i believe
you will not allow this kind of situation to happen
to me. I beg you to please listen to my cry.
  Thank you ma.
  May God Almighty be with you.

  Yours sincerely,
  Davies Olade.

messages.body:
Lady Agatha,
                               Thank God that you
have read my letters.  It may look like begging
letters and it is a begging letter bacause i am in a
 difficult situation here in Burkina Faso.
  I am a refugee in this place from Somalia and life
is too hard for me, really you can not carry my
problems but you can solve my immediate needs.  

  I  am not the only Somalia around here but i am
calling your attention because of my situation here,
no food, no clothes, no drugs.

  I call for your attention to help me out of this
situation and if life is not miserable for me , i
will not continue to write you.  You are a lady as
you said , i too i am a young man but life kept in
in Burkina Faso as a refugee, there is nothing i can
do for now than for you to help me out.  And i keep
on saying it to help me.  I want to go back to
somalia or kenya, i don't have money for that. 
Presently i need to survive  by eating, no money
nothing even the citizens of this country are
suffering talkless of a refugee.

  Lady Agatha, if you say that i am a beggar , well
i am but i believe that i will not continue to be a
beggar till the rest of my life.

  You may not understand what am passing through
here because you are not here but God knows what am
passing through  and he will deliver me out of it.
Nobody likes to be a beggar especially i, because am
suppose to be in school rather than to be a refugee
in another man' s country.  God will deliver me.

  Thank you.

  Please don' t address me sir.

  Yours,
  Davies Olade.

As ever,

A

messages.body:
18 May 2007

 

Dear Davies,

 

I am so pleased that you and Lady agatha have made contact at last.

 

The Holy Bagel Community is holding a conference in Smegaroon in late June and perhaps we can purchase a ticket for you to return to East Africa. I think it likely we could fly you out of Burkino Faso to Nairobi .

 

Lady Agatha is in charge of our monetary disbursements but the cost of the air ticket will come out of my budget and I need no further authorisation to puchase it.

 

May the Lord have mercy on you,

 

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH      








VACATION SPOT FOR THE DISCERNING SPY
BOOK YOUR GETAWAY NOW!

                     Greetings to you in Jesus name.  I  sent a mail to you over my problem and what Lady Agatha said  but i did not see your reply.  I explained to Lady Agatha of what i am passing through in this place, may she thought i was joking or not.  But mama , you will still be the one to help me talk to her because i don' t  know waht to say to her again.
The other time she wrote that my letter was a begging letter  and i agreed with her because if one is not in difficulties he/ she  will not beg.

Mama, i need your comment over this because i believe if i am your son passing through this kind of situation you will help me.  Mama i don' t want you to keep silent over this my matter i am just begging you for this.
You know how to help me mama to be frankly speaking, if you have intention to help me i believe you can do something even for you to talk to Lady Agatha over my matter you can do it.  I believe in you and God will help you too.
 
Please mama look into my matter, for me to write letter to you is not easy, if i go to church on sunday some brethren can give me something  and out of this i have to by 30 or 1hr to write message, if it is weekly days , i have to  help the owner of the cybercafe sweep before she will give me 30minutes to check my box.  So the situation here is too hard.
 
So mama please meet Lady Agatha for me and whatever you can afford to help me please do it for me.
May God be with you and your house.
Davies Olade.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha,
                                        Greetings to
you in Jesus name.   I will always remind you of my
problem because there is nobody that can help me for
now even the chaple that i use to go they can only
find me token money to feed for one or twice 
because they just came here not more than one year
and they have not been fully ok like that due to the
fact that most of the people here are muslims , if
not they would have done something for me.

  Lady Agatha, i know that you are in position to
help me out  and i don' t know why you don't
  want to help me.  You are asking for my ID, the
money that will cost me to scan my ID to you is 
very hard because it is 2000cfa,  and this 2000cfa
for me to get it is very hard and to use it to scan
is another problem.

  Please i want you to understand my present
situation, you are not here but God is here and is
my witness He is between me and you now,  if am ok i
will not be writing you this letter, refugee life
here is too difficult  and i want you to please look
into it.

  Life is miserable here in Burkina Faso  even for
the citizens  talkless of a refugee, please and
please for Christ sake do something for me.  The
proof you are talking about i can not afford to scan
with 2000cfa in this place even the church don' t
give me 2000cfa on sundays.

  Lady Agatha If you know the place call Burkina
Faso, it is very hard to see who, can help you here.
 Many of our somali people are in Niamey (Republic
of Niger)  bothe men and women roaming around to beg
for food.

  So lady Agatha , you have power to help me, except
if you don' t want to do so, if one is crying for
help from God , it is humanbeing will still help ,
even if you have everything in life today but
believe that is not by your power but by the grace
of God  and don' t think that i am a beggar but am
in need presently because of the situation and
because of problem in my country.

messages.raw:
Davies Olade

Dear Lady Agatha,
Greetings to you in Jesus name. I will always remind you of my problem because there is nobody that can help me for now even the chaple that i use to go they can only find me token money to feed for one or twice because they just came here not more than one year and they have not been fully ok like that due to the fact that most of the people here are muslims , if not they would have done something for me.

Lady Agatha, i know that you are in position to help me out and i don' t know why you don't want to help me. You are asking for my ID, the money that will cost me to scan my ID to you is very hard because it is 2000cfa, and this 2000cfa for me to get it is very hard and to use it to scan is another problem.

Please i want you to understand my present situation, you are not here but God is here and is my witness He is between me and you now, if am ok i will not be writing you this letter, refugee life here is too difficult and i want you to please look into it.

Life is miserable here in Burkina Faso even for the citizens talkless of a refugee, please and please for Christ sake do something for me. The proof you are talking about i can not afford to scan with 2000cfa in this place even the church don' t give me 2000cfa on sundays.

Lady Agatha If you know the place call Burkina Faso, it is very hard to see who, can help you here. Many of our somali people are in Niamey (Republic of Niger) bothe men and women roaming around to beg for food.

So lady Agatha , you have power to help me, except if you don' t want to do so, if one is crying for help from God , it is humanbeing will still help , even if you have everything in life today but believe that is not by your power but by the grace of God and don' t think that i am a beggar but am in need presently because of the situation and because of problem in my country.

Shallom peace.

Davies Olade.

messages.body:
Lady  Agatha,
                                Greetings to you
there.  Infact you always  surprise  with some names
you do call.  The other time you said  beggar, today
scammer, well only God who is saying the truth as
you don' t want to believe me and help me out, you
have the power and all descision is yours.

  Secondly , you said i use to sit  on internet, i
don' t think is true because any reasonable
humanbeig will not be sitting on internet all the
time.  But it is very important for me to spend 30
minutes to check my box at least every 48 hours
bacause it is situation that brought me like this. 
I am educated enough to even be working in the
office by now , if not because of problems, i was in
my second year in Mogadishu University  before i
left , it is not that i am too inferior like that of
which i don' t know what to do.

  I have been cerying unto you to help me get out of
this mess but i don' t know what you want me to do. 
There is noway i will go to a cybercafe that i will
not see somebody to help me with 30 minutes to check
my box, even the owner, i do help to sweep so that
she can give me some minutes to check my box because
some know that i am a refugee.

  This is only communication i have , no phone .

  Lady  Agatha , what do you want me to do?   
Infact i am really ashame for begging but i don' t
have any choice , no mother here , no father. What
do i do Ma?

  You are telling me that i am a scammer, may God
forgive.

  How are you going to help me?  I am living a
misrable life and you don' t want to help me why? 
What is my happiness being see myself as a refugee,
begging to eat, begging to by common soap, begging
to do all things because i don' t have money.

  Lady Agatha  please this is not fair  , i am
saying the truth.

  What do you want me to do?  I am in distress 
situation.  Why can't you believe me.  I  don' t
think the little money   you will give me can change
my life but it can only help  solve some of my
needs.

  Take me like your brother that is in need please.
  Have a nice day.

  Davies Olade

Remain blessed,

messages.body:
2 June 2007
 
Dearest Son,
 
 
As I mentioned in my last letter, I am taking a vacation on the lovely island of Smegaroon which as you may be aware is off the coast of south east Africa. 
 
So rather than send you the money, I will send you an airline ticket to Smegaroon - you can travel from Burkino Faso via Lagos, Nigeria - and after a few days rest and recuperation I will give you an airline ticket to Kenya.

May the bluebird of happiness nest in your bosom now and for evermore,
 

 
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH       
The Holy Bagel Community                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                           
 
www.freewebs.com/tushiem/

messages.body:
Lady Agatha,
                             Greetings to you.  I
believe one thing in life that if God be for anybody
no matter the difficulties one might encounter in
life , God must surely prove Himself when humanbeing
fails.  I believe that you are right of what you are
asking me for but i can not afford to scan anything
when my living is 70 percent lower to the amount i
will use to scan my ID card to you  but you don' t
want to listen to me  and you don' t want to believe
me.

  But  i will continue to call on my God, the God
that never fail even when humanbeing fails God will
prove Himself that He is God.

  If my help is in your hands  do it and if not God
will take control  because there is no where i can
get 2000cfa for me to scan my ID card to you.  I beg
everyday for me to see something to eat, i beg to do
everything, to buy soap to buy common mosquito coil
everyday.

  Sorry to ask you this question , please where do
you think i will get money to scan my ID card to
you?  when i live a miserable life here.  Even the
citizens of this country can not afford to eat three
times a day.  Please have conscience and understand 
what i am telling you for Christ sake.  

  I want you to have one thing at back of your mind
that whatever you do today God will ask you.  If i
can not afford to scan my ID card to you and you
beacuse of that denie me , know that God will ask
you at the end of the day, i want you to believe
this .  For me to write this message  if i did not
help the owner of the cybercafe to sweep , i will
beg somebody for 30 minutes before i can write
message.  I believe God will make a way for me.

  May God be with you.
  Davies.
  



  
  
  June 2
  
  My dear Olade,

Thank you for your email.

It is not that I don't believe you, old boy.

But we've been here before with you native chappies
and you can understand that we would just want proof
before we can continue.

We don't want a repeat of the Bowden Affair, you know.

Send me your ID and we can, as they say, go from
there.

Remain Blessed, 

A

messages.subject: RE: I believe you mama
messages.body:
Mama,
                  Thanks for your plan for me. I will be very happy to meet you in person.  I told Lady Agatha this before i got sick last week but she refused, because when i saw the symptoms of malaria , i just concluded with one of my friend here that it is better one find way to east africa our area than living a useless life here and that is why i wrote lady Agatha this last week before i was not able to come out during the week till friday.
 
Mama , i will be very glad if you can do this for me and that my friend Abass Mohammed because we are all suffering in this place but instead for us to go to nigeria it is better we go to Mali very close to Burkina Faso than Nigeria, i am afraid of the country talkless of going there, there is Kenya Airway in Mali, so we can go to Mali to board.
One lady said her testimony in the church today sunday  that armed rober attack them while she was coming on thursday from nigeria in Lagos.  So mama please you can help write the ticket to Mali  and not lagos.
 
Even there are many nigerians around here  of which the people of Burkina Faso did not like them  and i don' t want to go there. I do see them around cafe, so please mama , i prefer to board at mali than lagos.  Please you will still send transport to go to mali, i and the guy because we stay together.  May God help you mama to do this help.
 
We are suffering too much is only on sunday's i do feel happy , somebody may give me little thing to eat, only that the church is new, the pastor always pity our condition, sometimes he will give food and it is ok.
 
Mama , please don' t allow this to be too long because of our condition.
Thank you.
Davies .

messages.body:
Dear Son,
 
Thank you for your prompt reply - I will send air tickets for you and your friend to Kenya and Smegaroon via Mali. It is OK if you or your friend prefer to stay in Nairobi and not fly on to Smegaroon for a free holiday but wish to return staright away to see your families in Somalia.
 
Now you must let me have the full name of your friend and I will process the airline tickets. I hope you both have passports.
I will also send you one hundred gold dorks from our Kneidlach Funds for your expenses.
 
May the Almighty ensure youy receive everything you deserve.
 
 
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH                                                                                                                                                     
 The Holy Bagel Community

Mama,
                        May the good God make you happy till the rest of your life in Jesus name.
I will  be very very glad for this.  Infact it is because of your message i came with my friend to see if you have reply.  This is what i told Lady Agatha  to do for me  but she insisted  that i should scan my ID card  and i told her that there was no money for me to scan it and beside i live 70 percent lower to the amount to scan it, where does she want me to get money for it.  Living is too difficult even to buy a mosquito coil we also beg for money and people have known us  that we are beggar. 
We are eating what will see  and not to full our stomach.  But Lady Agatha did not want to understand our difficulties here.  To scan anything here is money, we are not working  and before i can write message today it is the money that my Pastor gave to take something to eat, we reserve to make sure i check my box and  write you ma.
 
My name is Davies Olade  and my second  is  ABASS  MOHAMMED. He too is not feeling fine because he has stomarch ulcer.
Please the 100 may not be enough, we will lodge in hotel  and buy some one or too clothes.  Then transport so please make it convinient for us.
May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you, guide you , protect you , bless you and crown all your efforts in life in Jesus name.
Shallom Peace.
 
Thanks.
Davies  Olade.

My name is Davies Olade and my second is ABASS MOHAMMED. He too is not feeling fine because he has stomarch ulcer.
Please the 100 may not be enough, we will lodge in hotel and buy some one or too clothes. Then transport so please make it convinient for us.
May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you, guide you , protect you , bless you and crown all your efforts in life in Jesus name.

Shallom Peace.

Thanks.
Davies Olade.

Remain blessed,

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Tushie,

I must urge caution in this matter.

Davies Olade has not even sent us any identification,
and has steadfastly refused to answer even the
simplest enquriy about the nature of his requests.

How do we know that he is not some ghastly little man
in an internet cafe, like Prince Charles Nwaimo?

Please pop by the office and we can discuss this.

A

messages.body:
6 June 2007
 
My Dearest Agatha,
 
So kind of you to tell me of your fears regarding Davies Olade. However, I think we can assume he is a genuine indigent. As you know, I am currently in Smegaroon on vacation but I went to the Bialy Chapel and spoke to Father Tossov about Davies and he agrees with me that we do have a genuine case here to be referred to the relief division of the Council of Underdeveloped Nations Trusts. 
 
Meanwhile I have instructed Dr Joseph Kucker of the Chavster, Manfred and Newman Merchant Bank to send one hundred gold dorks to Davies from the Community's Kreplach Fund.
 
Of course, if we discover that Davies has not been truthful with us, we can always ask Agent Sheva of the Private International Security Service to pay him a visit.
 
Yours affectionately,

TUSHIE

messages.subject: May God be with you
messages.body:
Mama, 
                       Greetings to you in Jesus name .  Thanks for your letter, may the good God in His infinite power be with you  and your house.  May the good God grant you and your children generational blessings  and lift you up to your expectation in life in Jesus name amen.
Mama , there is one thing that always gives joy  and that is word of God,  despite that people live a sinful life today but God remain God and His words remain ever. 
   
Truly, we live in the world full of  lies and fraud as Lady Agatha said in her letter to me, apart  for being a christian ( born again) t the chapel i use to worship is against  lies , fraud  or scam according to the world of Lady Agatha but i believe in the word of God according to the word of God in the book of 
( 3JOHN: 11  that says  BELOVED, DO NOT IMITATE WHAT IS EVIL, BUT WHAT IS GOOD. HE WHO DOES GOOD IS OF GOD,  BUT HE WHO DOES EVIL  HAS  NOT SEEN GOD )  The thought of Lady Agatha towards me makes me bitter in my heart, i don' t know why.  I pray to God to give me power to live a holy life.  May be people are tell lies to be reach i don' t know because it is not my work , all i know according to the word of God in the book of ( PROVERB 13:11 says that WEALTH GAINED BY DISHONESTY WILL BE DIMNIISHED,  BUT HE WHO GATHERS BY LABOR WILL INCREASE.)  Mama , i want you to check your bible and  the scriptures by yourself, any good christian will not engage himself in this rubish because God can not lie.  I pray to meet you mama so that you can still put me through in life. I wish to go to bible school if God help me, you are a mother to me  and i wish to know you more.  
 
Secondly,  I saw a letter now the man ask me to tell him how is going to send one hundred dork to me, i met the message this evening plus your  messages and Lady Agatha's letter written to you.  I will write the person how to send it.  
 
The word of God is making me happy bacause i know that non of His word will go unfulfil, if there are people engage theirselves in any fraud or scam, i believe they are ignorance of the word. When you know the truth, the truth shall set you free.  Mama , pls help me tell Lady Agatha to have a good thought for me i beg you. Her words makes me cry in my heart but God said in the book of  (JAMES 1:12, BLESSED IS THE MAN WHO ENDURES TEMPTATION; FOR WHEN HE HAS BEEN APPROVED , HE WILL RECEIVE  THE CROWN OF LIFE WHICH THE LORD HAS PROMISED TO THOSE WHO LOVE)  This is my satnd in life, no matter the case may be God remain God.  
 
Mama , i thank you for your love and passion  towards me. May  God Almighty continue  to help you in all area of your life in Jesus name.  God will shower His abundant blessings upon your life in Jesus name. Pls mama write your telephone number to me in your next letter  so that if i reach Mali or Kenya we shall call you, i wish to meet you mama. 
Shallom peace 
Davies Olade.

Thank you for your email. It is a pleasure to hear
from you.

What conference?

And do not think that I am pleased that these
modalities are going ahead just because of a few
begging emails from you.

Agent Shevchenko is watching your move. And he always
shoots straight.

You really must cut down on the vodka chasers at Annie's Bar. The conference you are attending is the Council of Underdeveloped Nations Trusts quartly meeting in Ougadougou. my diary has now been updated and I shall be pleased
to travel to Ougagougou. -- A

messages.subject: Dear Mama
messages.body:
Dear Mama,
                          Greetings to you ma. How are you ma?  Hope all is well with you? It shall be well with you and your house in Jesus name amen.
 
Mama, i want to tell you that i have not received anything since then, what baffles me is that the person you said he would send me money , he sent me to Mr Mbalz  and Mr Mbalz pass me to another man called Haid  Salaami and nothing happened.
 
I got a letter that Lady Agatha would be coming to Ouagadougou , Burkina Faso for a conference , when i wrote her that i will like to meet her in person that i heard  she would be coming to Burkina Faso  she said what conference?  Automatically she is not coming for a conference, later she wrote me that she would be coming, i asked her the place the conference is going to be hold or the hotel she is going to lodge but no answer .
 
I just discover that they are playing me  because somebody who is coming for a conference and she never knew about the conference 24 hours to the day of conference this is terible.
 
If they are deceiving me.  Can you deceive me mama?  I just want to tell you this and you know what to do.  If they can not help me for ticket please help with the money so we can take our leave by road.
 
I beg you for this because i am really tired of pushing me up and down and they turn me to a ball by passing me up and down.
 
Mama, please i lay everything to unto your hands  and see how you can send me the money by yourself.  If you can not afford the ticket , please help with the money so we can take road.  This is all i have to say now.
 
I look unto you ma.
 
Shallom peace.
 
Davies.

messages.body:
Dearest Davies,
 
Oh dear, I am so sorry that you still have not received all that you so richly deserve. 
 
I have spoken to Lady Agatha Bristol and I assure you that she will soon be with you. Unfortunately her husband, Sir Marmite Luny-Binns, intercepted the message and he forgot that Lady Agatha was going out to West Africa early next week. On his behalf, I apologise for any distress this has caused you.
 
I have great faith in Dr Haid de Salaami of the Chavster Bank - fear not, all will be well.
 
Remain blessed,
TUSHIE

messages.body:
Mama,
                   Thanks  for  your letter.  The  only thing  which i believe is that if you really want to help me in this situation  with your heart mama ,  if  really you want me to leave here  either by air or road, then please help me send the money  because i am not feeling fine in this place.
 
Secondly, what am suppose to take something, i can not take it  or eat it, i do starve myself just to make sure that i send message to you.  If  somebody manage to give me 300 or 500 cfa, instead for me to take something good a bit , i will take something like pap, just to have coins to write message.  Infact it is a shameful thing that i still beg for many things here, like today being sunday , the little thing some one gave me to eat , what i suppose to take a good meal, i can not because i want to get intouch with you.
 
Mama whether Lady Agatha is coming, i don' t have any confidence in it, if you can not help me mama  just tell me once that you can not do this or the community can not.
 
What is so hard for  somebody you have  instructed to do something since 2 weeks now , nothing has happened,  i mean you need to understand my problem and situation.
 
Lady Agatha do against me, saying i am a scammer ,  but i know non of the scammer is looking for the help of One Hundred Dorks , the money for me to take my leave now become problem.  I  will beg to buy mosquito coil, beg to eat; beg to buy common soap, i explain this but know way.
 
Mama, my conclusion is that , if i can not receive anything please tell me once and for all.  If God says my help is in your hands do it and if not there is no problem, God will make a way  where it seems to be noway.  If the people you have instructed to do something and they failed   what next.
 
My second is suffering of stomarch ulcer , no money to buy drugs  , even to take a better food.
Mama, i  just need  a word from you.
 
If you are going to help me send  the money or not. Forget about the  ticket for the moment, if it is delaying , life first.  We need life before anything.
 
Mama, do something and if there is nothing please kindly tell me.  Our living is totally difficult.
 
Thanks.
May God be with you.
 
Davies

messages.body:
Dearest Son,

 
Have faith, my boy - Lady Agatha Bristol leaves for Ougadougou tomorrow and she has your money - I believe this amounts to a little over four hundred US dollars.
 
She is staying at the Sofitel Ouaga Hotel. Naturally she is very busy preparing for the Council of Underdeveloped Nations Trusts' conference on West African Schlemiels. So she has asked me to tell you that you can meet her on Wednesday 20 June at 9.00am at the hotel reception desk. If this is inconvenient, you should contact her by e-mail as soon as possible to fix an alternative time.
 
Please remember to bring with you some form of identity such as a passport. We would not want your cash to be given to a dishonest person.
 
May God help you,

 
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

 My dear 419 Scammer,

Well well -  you have finally worked out that we have
been wasting your time from day one. Our only regret
is that we could not waste more of your time and
money. 

You are no refugee but a worthless criminal plying his
pathetic and tired 419 trade from some sweaty internet
café in Festac Town or some other Godforsaken dump. 

You do not scare us, you do not worry us. The Foreign
Office and our elite associates exist to give you what
you deserve. 

So congratulations - you've had the treatment from The
Special Operations Department.

Now get lost.

A

messages.body:
20 June 2007
 
Davies,
 
I do know how difficult life is in Burkina Faso, Nigeria and indeed in all of West Africa. There are not enough jobs and the people in power steal much of the aid that comes in from Europe and America.
 
 
Now I could be wrong but I think you are a young man - probably Nigerian as the fraudulent e-mails asking for money began in that country. So let me give you some words of advice:
 
1. These tired old scams have by and large run their course - only the most foolish of people would send money to West Africa by Western Union or Moneygram. In fact, many Western Union offices specifically warn customers about the Nigerian 419 scams.

2. You can speak English which must help in finding honest employment. I genuinely wish you the very best of luck and if there is any way I can assist you find work, do not hesitate to contact me. In fact, my organisation - Private International Security Systems - will soon be recruiting agents. This job entails finding e-mail criminals and reporting them to the few police officers who can be trusted to prosecute them.
 
3. Thanks to our Internet tracking programme the Holy Bagel Community  knows exactly from where you have transmitted your e-mails. Be warned, Davies, that although the local police can be easily bribed, our operatives do not accept dash and if you continue to send out 419 e-mails, you will receive a visit from one of our agents which you will not find a pleasant experience.
 
 
Best wishes,
 
 
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
West African Division
Private International Security Systems
P.O.Box 362
Accra
Ghana
www.freewebs.com/tushiem/
